value: Sabse pehle hum JSON objects ke saath code karna seekhenge. Aapne introduction mei yeh padha hoga ki JSON objects kya hote hai. Ab yeh video dekho, aur iss example ko likh kar run karne ki koshish karo.
JSON aur Dictionary mei kya difference hai?

Dictionary aapka ek data structure hai jo memory (jaise RAM) mei store hota hai. JSON ek file based exchange format jisse ki alag alag programs ek doosre se baat kar sakte hai ya information exchange kar sakte hai. Jaise:
Ek program json mei kuch information output kar sakta hai, jo doosra program padh sakta hai
Server apna data json mei available kara sakta hai, jisko koi bhi client use kar kar apna programs aur behetar kar sakte hai
